item.description:
What's new

  • DuckDuckGo will no longer provide browser updates for macOS Catalina and Big Sur below version 11.4. Update to a newer version of macOS in order to continue using the most recent version of DuckDuckGo.
  • You can now enable Autofill Auto-lock to also protect access to your Logins and Credit Card while filling forms.
  • We fixed a bug that prevented opening Outlook emails in a new Window.

What's new

  • DuckDuckGo will no longer provide browser updates for macOS Catalina and Big Sur below version 11.4. Update to a newer version of macOS in order to continue using the most recent version of DuckDuckGo.
  • You can now enable Autofill Auto-lock to also protect access to your Logins and Credit Card while filling forms.
  • We fixed a bug that prevented opening Outlook emails in a new Window.
